metadata.dc:title: Subset of lithic artifacts from Pirro Nord 13
metadata.dc:creator: Domenico Giusti
metadata.dc:subject: Pirro Nord 13
Spatial database
Taphonomy
metadata.dc:description: Subset of lithic artifacts from the Early Pleistocene site of Pirro Nord 13, SUs C and D. The dataset provides taphononic (patina) and spatial (x, y, z coordinates) information.
metadata.dc:source: Arzarello, M., Pavia, G., Peretto, C., Petronio, C., Sardella, R., 2012. Evidence of an Early Pleistocene hominin presence at Pirro Nord (Apricena, Foggia, southern Italy): P13 site. Quat. Int. 267, 56--61. 10.​1016/​j.​quaint.​2011.​01.​042

Arzarello, M., Peretto, C., Moncel, M.H., 2015. The Pirro Nord site (Apricena, Fg, Southern Italy) in the context of the first European peopling: Convergences and divergences. Quat. Int. 389, 255--263. 10.​1016/​j.​quaint.​2014.​08.​051
